tickets if automated believe already raised issue was advising seeing check tickets for but concerned there multiple locations appearing these tickets seem have started including tickets appeared list for requests although say etc check location seems be for some oddly appearing when searching for requests customer being can you take look please advise how we can stop happening going forward these tickets appear relevant queue also location correct checks being set generic request resolved closed complete weekly check for bishops gate false generic request resolved closed complete weekly check
